knimeNode.name: PIA Compiler
knimeNode.shortDescription: Compiles search results into a PIA XML file.

fullDescription.intro: To start a new analysis, you need to compile the search results of one or more search engine runs. The data is structured to speed up further analyses. The result is saved as an XML file, which is used as input for the PIA analysis nodes.
fullDescription.option: A distinctive name of the compilation, can be left blank.

ports.inPort: The spectrum identification results, which should be compiled for this analysis.
ports.outPort: The PIA intermediate XML file containing the compilation of search results

views.view: A short summary of the compilation.
